name: mathesar
description: Mathesar is a web-based data management and visualization tool built on PostgreSQL. It lets users explore, edit, and collaborate on database tables without technical expertise, ideal for small organizations.
features: Visual database interface: Browse and edit PostgreSQL tables through an intuitive spreadsheet-like UI.
No-code queries: Build complex database queries using visual filters and joins without writing SQL.
Data types: Support for all PostgreSQL data types with appropriate input controls and validation.
Relationship mapping: Visualize and navigate foreign key relationships between tables.
Collaborative editing: Multiple users can view and edit data simultaneously with conflict resolution.
Import/export: Load data from CSV, Excel, or JSON files and export in various formats.
Custom views: Create saved views with specific filters, sorts, and column selections.
Data validation: Set constraints and validation rules to maintain data quality and integrity.
Search functionality: Find records across tables using full-text search and advanced filters.
Permission system: Control access to databases, tables, and records with granular permissions.
Schema designer: Create and modify table structures, columns, and relationships through the UI.
API access: Interact with your data programmatically through automatically generated REST APIs.
